result.eng: Do not talk to the other person.
result.ga: Ná labhair leis an duine eile
result.orig: Ná labhair leis an duine eile
result.html: Ná labhair leis an duine eileDo not talk to the other person.
result.ponchtml: Ná laḃair leis an duine eileDo not talk to the other person.

result.eng: Am I the last person?
result.ga: An mise an duine deireanach
result.orig: An mise an duine deireanach
result.html: An mise an duine deireanachAm I the last person?
result.ponchtml: An mise an duine deireanaċAm I the last person?

result.eng: This is the person to whom the money was given.
result.ga: Seo an duine ar tugadh an t-airgead dó
result.orig: Seo an duine ar tugadh an t-airgead dó
result.html: Seo an duine ar tugadh an t-airgead dóThis is the person to whom the money was given.
result.ponchtml: Seo an duine ar tugaḋ an t-airgead dóThis is the person to whom the money was given.

result.eng: We expected three but only one person came.
result.ga: Bhí muid ag súil le triúr agus níor tháinig ach duine
result.orig: Bhí muid ag súil le triúr agus níor tháinig ach duine
result.html: Bhí muid ag súil le triúr agus níor tháinig ach duineWe expected three but only one person came.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí muid ag súil le triúr agus níor ṫáinig aċ duineWe expected three but only one person came.

result.eng: I asked that person a question.
result.ga: Chuir mé ceist ar an duine sin
result.orig: Chuir mé ceist ar an duine sin
result.html: Chuir mé ceist ar an duine sinI asked that person a question.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir mé ceist ar an duine sinI asked that person a question.

result.eng: Who is this person?
result.ga: Cé hé an duine seo
result.orig: Cé hé an duine seo
result.html: Cé hé an duine seoWho is this person?
result.ponchtml: Cé hé an duine seoWho is this person?

result.eng: He is a very nice person.
result.ga: Duine an-deas is ea é
result.orig: Duine an-deas is ea é
result.html: Duine an-deas is ea éHe is a very nice person.
result.ponchtml: Duine an-deas is ea éHe is a very nice person.

result.eng: He is a reasonable person.
result.ga: Is duine ciallmhar é
result.orig: Is duine ciallmhar é
result.html: Is duine ciallmhar éHe is a reasonable person.
result.ponchtml: Is duine ciallṁar éHe is a reasonable person.

result.eng: He's a smart person.
result.ga: Is duine cliste é
result.orig: Is duine cliste é
result.html: Is duine cliste éHe's a smart person.
result.ponchtml: Is duine cliste éHe's a smart person.

result.eng: He is the richest person on the face of the earth.
result.ga: Is eisean an duine is saibhre ar dhroim na talún
result.orig: Is eisean an duine is saibhre ar dhroim na talún
result.html: Is eisean an duine is saibhre ar dhroim na talúnHe is the richest person on the face of the earth.
result.ponchtml: Is eisean an duine is saiḃre ar ḋroim na talúnHe is the richest person on the face of the earth.

result.eng: Many a person in this country doesn't read a book the whole year.
result.ga: Is iomaí duine sa tír seo nach léann leabhar ar bith ó cheann ceann na bliana
result.orig: Is iomaí duine sa tír seo nach léann leabhar ar bith ó cheann ceann na bliana
result.html: Is iomaí duine sa tír seo nach léann leabhar ar bith ó cheann ceann na blianaMany a person in this country doesn't read a book the whole year.
result.ponchtml: Is iomaí duine sa tír seo naċ léann leaḃar ar biṫ ó ċeann ceann na blianaMany a person in this country doesn't read a book the whole year.

result.eng: I am the only person here.
result.ga: Is mise an t-aon duine anseo
result.orig: Is mise an t-aon duine anseo
result.html: Is mise an t-aon duine anseoI am the only person here.
result.ponchtml: Is mise an t-aon duine anseoI am the only person here.

result.eng: I am an old person now.
result.ga: Is seanduine anois mé
result.orig: Is seanduine anois mé
result.html: Is seanduine anois méI am an old person now.
result.ponchtml: Is seanduine anois méI am an old person now.

result.eng: No such person exists.
result.ga: Ní ann don duine sin
result.orig: Ní ann don duine sin
result.html: Ní ann don duine sinNo such person exists.
result.ponchtml: Ní ann don duine sinNo such person exists.

result.eng: The news spread from person to person.
result.ga: Scaip an scéal ó dhuine go duine
result.orig: Scaip an scéal ó dhuine go duine
result.html: Scaip an scéal ó dhuine go duineThe news spread from person to person.
result.ponchtml: Scaip an scéal ó ḋuine go duineThe news spread from person to person.

result.eng: That's the same person.
result.ga: Sin é an duine céanna
result.orig: Sin é an duine céanna
result.html: Sin é an duine céannaThat's the same person.
result.ponchtml: Sin é an duine céannaThat's the same person.

result.eng: There is a person from America in my class.
result.ga: Tá duine as Meiriceá i mo rang
result.orig: Tá duine as Meiriceá i mo rang
result.html: Tá duine as Meiriceá i mo rangThere is a person from America in my class.
result.ponchtml: Tá duine as Meiriceá i mo rangThere is a person from America in my class.

result.eng: Hello. [to greet more than one person]
result.ga: Dia daoibh
result.orig: Dia daoibh
result.html: Dia daoibhHello. [to greet more than one person]
result.ponchtml: Dia daoiḃHello. [to greet more than one person]

result.eng: One hundred euro per person per week.
result.ga: Céad euro an duine sa tseachtain

result.html: Céad euro an duine sa tseachtainOne hundred euro per person per week.
result.ponchtml: Céad euro an duine sa tseaċtainOne hundred euro per person per week.

result.eng: Two hundred euro per person per week.

result.html: Dhá chéad euro an duine sa tseachtainTwo hundred euro per person per week.

result.eng: The tribunal will not pay for legal costs incurred by a person.
result.ga: Ní íocfaidh an binse as costais dlí a thiteann ar dhuine
result.orig: Ní íocfaidh an binse as costais dlí a thiteann ar dhuine
result.html: Ní íocfaidh an binse as costais dlí a thiteann ar dhuineThe tribunal will not pay for legal costs incurred by a person.
result.ponchtml: Ní íocfaiḋ an binse as costais dlí a ṫiteann ar ḋuineThe tribunal will not pay for legal costs incurred by a person.

result.eng: I never met a more slippery person.
result.ga: Níor bhuail mé le duine ní ba shleamhaine riamh
result.orig: Níor bhuail mé le duine ní ba shleamhaine riamh
result.html: Níor bhuail mé le duine ní ba shleamhaine riamhI never met a more slippery person.
result.ponchtml: Níor ḃuail mé le duine ní ba ẛleaṁaine riaṁI never met a more slippery person.

result.eng: He found another person who had flying experience.
result.ga: D'aimsigh sé duine eile a raibh taithí eitilte aige
result.orig: D'aimsigh sé duine eile a raibh taithí eitilte aige
result.html: D'aimsigh sé duine eile a raibh taithí eitilte aigeHe found another person who had flying experience.
result.ponchtml: D'aimsiġ sé duine eile a raiḃ taiṫí eitilte aigeHe found another person who had flying experience.

result.eng: A microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.
result.ga: Seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadh
result.orig: Seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadh
result.html: Seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadhA microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.
result.ponchtml: Seans gur fearr a ḟóireann seirḃís ṁicreaḃlagála dá ċineál don duine gnóṫaċ atá ag iarraiḋ tuairimí a noċtaḋA microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.

result.eng: Among the 60 people on the bus, I was the only white person.
result.ga: I measc 60 duine ar an mbus ba mise an t-aon duine den chine geal
result.orig: I measc 60 duine ar an mbus ba mise an t-aon duine den chine geal
result.html: I measc 60 duine ar an mbus ba mise an t-aon duine den chine gealAmong the 60 people on the bus, I was the only white person.
result.ponchtml: I measc 60 duine ar an mbus ba mise an t-aon duine den ċine gealAmong the 60 people on the bus, I was the only white person.
